name: Tentacle Outburst
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels its body for some turns to strike the ground with its tentacles, then bursts violently under the target, dealing moderate stabbing damage and apply an unstable footing to the affected creatures in its radius.'

name: Twisted Strike
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels to form all of its tentacles into a huge, twisted needle, striking the targets in a line with tremendous stabbing damage.'

name: Summon Tentacles
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster slams the ground with its arm, sprouting 3 tentacles out of the ground near the target.'

name: Pin Missile
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster quickly sways its limb to shoot off needle-like projectiles in a cone, dealing stabbing damage to the targets.'

name: Charging Stance
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster sets itself into guarding stance, blocking physical damage while gaining speed.'
//: 15 turns duration, to make titans not OP everytime.
